pkgmetadata.longdescription: Description===========A simple console JSON formatter.Reads any JSON from stdin and returns a pretty printed conversion to stdout.Installation============.. note:: This package should be fully compatible with ``virtualenv``You can install directly using ``pip`` or ``easy_install``:: pip install jsonfor, respectively:: easy_install jsonfInstallation from source------------------------- Download the source tarball from http://pypi.python.org/pypi or https://github.com/exhuma/braindump/tree/master/jsonformat- Untar the file:: tar xf jsonf-1.0.tar.gz- Install it:: cd jsonf-1.0 && python setup.py install
